cockatrice_carddatabase.cards:
Spyro Fire Element
R 2/RR 3 Enchantment - Empowerment Enchantment
1 Empower red Dragon (Attach to red Dragon you control and detach other empowerments from that permanent. This card becomes an Aura with “enchant permanent” for as long as it remains attached.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+1. 2R: Enchanted creature gains trample and indestructible until end of turn.
Spyro Electricity Element
W 2/WW 3 Enchantment - Empowerment Enchantment
1 Empower white Dragon (Attach to white Dragon you control and detach other empowerments from that permanent. This card becomes an Aura with “enchant permanent” for as long as it remains attached.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+1. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a creature, put a stun counter on that creature. XW: Tap up to X target permanents, then enchanted creature deals 1 damage to those permanents.
Spyro Earth Element
G 2/GG 3 Enchantment - Empowerment Enchantment
1 Empower green Dragon (Attach to green Dragon you control and detach other empowerments from that permanent. This card becomes an Aura with “enchant permanent” for as long as it remains attached.) Enchanted creature gets +0/+4 and gains vigilance and trample. 2G: Enchanted creature gains indestructible and hexproof until end of turn.
Spyro Ice Element
U 2/UU 3 Enchantment - Empowerment Enchantment
1 Empower blue Dragon Enchanted creature gets -1/+2 and gains triple strike. (That creature deals first-strike, regular, and last-strike combat damage.) 2U: Enchanted creature gains splash damage 2 until end of turn.
Spyro Wind Element
W 2/WW 3 Enchantment - Empowerment Enchantment
1 Empower white Dragon Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a permanent, you may pay {2}, and if you do return that permanent to its owner’s hands. 2W: Enchanted creature deals 1 damage to up to three different targets.
Spyro Fear Element
R 2/RR 3 Enchantment - Empowerment Enchantment
1 Empower red Dragon Whenever enchanted creature deals damage a creature, you may pay {2}, and if you do that creature fights target creature. XR: Enchanted creature deals 1 damage to target up to X different creatures.
Spyro Poison Element
G 2/GG 3 Enchantment - Empowerment Enchantment
1 Empower green Dragon (Attach to green Dragon you control and detach other empowerments from that permanent. This card becomes an Aura with “enchant permanent” for as long as it remains attached.) Enchanted creature gains infect. {2}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature with at least one -1/-1 counter.
Spyro Shadow Element
U 2/UU 3 Enchantment - Empowerment Enchantment
1 Empower blue Dragon (Attach to blue Dragon you control and detach other empowerments from that permanent. This card becomes an Aura with “enchant permanent” for as long as it remains attached.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+1. 2U: Enchanted creature gains shadow until end of turn.
Spyro Water Element
U U 1 Enchantment - Empowerment Enchantment
1 Empower blue Dragon (Attach to blue Dragon you control and detach other empowerments from that permanent. This card becomes an Aura with “enchant permanent” for as long as it remains attached.) Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, create that many Dragonfly tokens.
Spyro Aether Element
3/PPP 3 Legendary Enchantment - Aura Enchantment
1 Enchant purple Dragon. Enchanted creature gets +5/+5 and gains lifelink. Exile enchanted creature: Gain 20 life, then you may pay any amount of life, and if you do, return X permanents from your graveyard to the battlefield under your control, where X is one third of the life spent this way. If the exiled creature is your commander, it cannot return to the command zone.
Spyro Dark Aether Element
B 3/BBB 5 Legendary Enchantment - Aura Enchantment
1 Enchant black Dragon. Enchanted creature gets +5/+5 and gains deathtouch. T: Transform target permanent. T: Take control of target permanent until your next upkeep, then untap it.
